xml.src:
<inu-table-flex> <inu-table-flex-header size="0.7fr">Property</inu-table-flex-header> <inu-table-flex-header size="2fr">Type</inu-table-flex-header> <inu-table-flex-header size="2fr">Default value</inu-table-flex-header> <inu-table-flex-header size="4fr">Description</inu-table-flex-header>
<inu-table-flex-row> <inu-table-flex-cell>values</inu-table-flex-cell> <inu-table-flex-cell>InuSelectItem{{genericT()}}[]</inu-table-flex-cell> <inu-table-flex-cell>[]</inu-table-flex-cell> <inu-table-flex-cell>the list of values used for the different checkboxes</inu-table-flex-cell> </inu-table-flex-row>
<inu-table-flex-row> <inu-table-flex-cell>disabled</inu-table-flex-cell> <inu-table-flex-cell>boolean</inu-table-flex-cell> <inu-table-flex-cell>false</inu-table-flex-cell> <inu-table-flex-cell></inu-table-flex-cell> </inu-table-flex-row> </inu-table-flex>
